title: Does anyone know what "Advanced Bot Testing" is?
body:
##EDIT: Problem solved! I have  now gained the ~~stacks~~ ~~power~~ knowledge I have been searching for, and, after testing myself, have discovered it is simply Rito's April fool's surprise.

As I was spectating a friend of mine, he told me his opponents were all bots. Curious, I decided to start spectating and see for myself. Blue Team's {{champion:75}}Toplaner was spamming taunt under tower as their {{champion:106}}Jungler  prepared for an invade by himself. Against a {{champion:107}}Rengar. Ha. Ha! AHAHAHA-- I noticed, however, that every player, including the "bots" had usernames and even some clan tags. My friend said that his {{champion:21}}lane opponent had the username "Miss Fourtune Bot", but I saw his/her username and clan tag like a regular Summoner's.

---------
---------


##(Not exactly sure where to put this, so I'll just put it here in Gameplay)
I checked League's service site and found this message saying: 
> Unranked SR games may be randomly selected for Advanced Bot testing. We appreciate your patience with any bugs or glitches you may encounter.

I haven't encountered any bugs, I was just curious on what this could possibly be. Will it affect SR games in any way? Is it searching for bots, or creating them? _Thank you for reading!_
######Please do not downvote this post, I am just asking a question because I do not know the answer yet. :J

replies.body:
They're not actually bots, you're still matchmade against 5 regular players. The game just displays them all as ____ bot and removes all chat, as well as putting in those extra messages so they seem like bots. It's the april fools thing.

Similarly, you and your teammates also appear as bots to the opposing team, so both sides are made to 'think' they're playing bots, when really it's humans vs humans.

Ahh, I see, thanks! I thought of that when I watched a friend's game of mine after he said he was versus all bots. I watched it and saw all the players had regular usernames and some had clan tags.

Very odd...prank, though!

It was well done I think. During my first match I legit didn't realise it was fake, although it seemed super odd that there was a bot jg (and whats more, the scoreboard was wrong about who the jg was).

The dev blog is opbviously april fools flavoured with all the buzzwords and so on, but having not seen it before my first game made it neat.

Hey guys,

I just played several matches of ARAM, and they are do full of bots.  They are sometimes bugged, running on exact the same route, or running against each other and then stacking together running in one place. They do not pick up health buffs and running without a purpose like zombies. really annoying.

Hmm....those are the *actual* bots that people use for leveling smurfs. You should probably report any of those you see, though I'm not sure if it will do anything. "Advanced Bots" are different--these are players in SR games disguised as "bots", but are still players.
Just an april fool prank from Rito. Still the same 5v5 but all chat is disabled and the enemy summoner names are changed to "x bot".

Uhh, yeah, I kinda figured that out already xD
but thanks anyway.
So I guess, we are not getting those icons huh?
I got the icon a couple hours after playing a bot game. I think you can see it on my profile. It looks pretty neat. They did say it might take several weeks for everyone to get them.

I'm not quite sure about the icons--I only know about the bots themselves. I do believe you'll still be able to get an icon, since it *is* an April fool's event, and most of those events have icons to go with them. :T
I won't be getting it since I stick to ARAMs and customs, though! 

######RIP me

i would really love to play this... but sadly im driving cross country :(

it would be amazing to be called "nidalee bot" even if just for a day

Guys, how to play that, i don't have option "advanced",  i have beginner and intermediate options in co-ap vs al menu
Edit: or i just need to play normal pvp blind pick/draft ?
Edit2: ok i got it.. if someone dont know, u need to play normal blind or draft pvp

Yeahh it's just normal PvP but without chats and bots names.. it looks so real but I knew it .. just thought they were a team of scripters or something.. the weird thing is that they say there may be bugs and I found one
EVERYTHING INVISIBLE IT'S NOT!! So don't play shaco or teemo.. you're gonna loose your time.
Same thing just happened. Shit was crazy. I was hella confused.
I never actually fought bots though--I've been sticking to ARAMs for now--but I saw the message appear on my client and on Riot's [status site](https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na).

I just played the best game of my life lul

Everyone on my team legit thought it was bots
lmao...did they get rekt? Or...did they actually stomp them?! xD
